short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Document Camera Viewer for Chromium Browsers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows for a traditional document camera interface on chromium browsers. 
Updated to Version 2 for a new look and a much better workflow.

Version 2.2.2 Changes from 2.2.1
Fixed an issue with recording when audio is not shared. Thanks Tina!

Version 2.2.1 Changes from 2.2.0
Basic Tutorial in the Heart Menu
Minimizing of the main toolbar is possible now.

Version 2.2.0 Changes from 2.1.10
Emoji Favorites!
Picture in Picture from additional cameras, like a webcam.
Initial Screen Recording Support!

Version 2.1.10 Changes from 2.1.9
Moved Emoji Search to top of screen for easy viewing with on screen keyboards and increased search results to 50. 

Version 2.1.9 Changes from 2.1.8
Improved feedback
Basic sounds for camera and emoji
Fix bug where pencil and eraser tools would not draw on initial touch/click

Version 2.1.8 Changes from 2.1.7
Better user feedback for button interaction
Removed Material Dependency

Version 2.1.7 Changes from 2.1.1
Improved Camera Selection and Resolution Detection
Tool Preview on Image
Updated Styling for Consistency
On the way to being the best Document Camera Software

Version 2.1.1 Changes from 2.1.0
Emoji Searching and a HUGE SELECTION 

Version 2.1.0 Changes from 2.0.1
Emoji Support

Version 2.0.1 Changes from 2.0
Changed colors to allow viewing white selector
Improved speed of resolution selection
Reduced resolution options to common resolutions
Improved touch support
Improved camera permission requesting
